AppDesc.message: An easily way to turn ON/OFF website's JavaScript

BlackList.message: Blacklist (Always block javascript for following url, one url per line):

ConfirmReset.message: To confirm Reset click Save button

DontRefreshDisable.message: Don't refresh current webpage when disable JS

DontRefreshEnable.message: Don't refresh current webpage when enable JS

WhiteList.message: Whitelist (Always allow javascript for following url):
